titles: The fall and funeral of Northampton, in an elegy late published in Latin, by the Reverend Dr. S. Ford ; since, made English, with some variation, and enlarged, by F.A. ... a sad spectator of that frightful scene.
author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.
F. A.
publisher: Printed for John Wright, and are to be sold by William Cockrain ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
